featuredArticle.title: OpenAI Valued at $200 Billion in Largest Private Tech Funding Round Ever
featuredArticle.excerpt: OpenAI has closed a historic $15 billion funding round, valuing the AI company at $200 billion. The investment, led by Microsoft and SoftBank, will accelerate the development of AGI and expand enterprise AI solutions globally.
